ideas.idea: AI-powered code review assistant that learns from your team's coding patterns and automatically suggests improvements, catches bugs, and enforces style guidelines in real-time
Smart accessibility checker web extension that scans websites in real-time and provides instant feedback on accessibility issues with suggested fixes for developers
Blockchain-based carbon credit marketplace where individuals and companies can trade verified carbon offsets with transparent tracking and automated smart contracts
Mental health chatbot using NLP to detect emotional patterns in text messages and proactively suggest coping strategies, meditation, or professional help resources
IoT-enabled urban farming system with sensors for soil moisture, light, and nutrients that automatically optimizes growing conditions and predicts harvest times
